t: Resolution No. 2022-09 — To Adopt a Business Organizations Ordinance

c.t: Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe Business Organizations Ordinance

c.x: "Articles" means the original articles of incorporation or organization, or
"Board" means the board of directors or other governing board of a corporat
"Corporation" means a corporation formed under this Ordinance.
"Director" means a member of a board of directors.
"Distribution" means a direct or indirect transfer of money or other proper
"Entity" means any Corporation or Non-Profit Corporation formed under this
"General Counsel" means the General Counsel of the Tribe.
"Non-Profit Corporation" means a public benefit, mutual benefit or religiou
"Person" means a natural person, partnership (whether general or limited an
"Shareholder" means a person holding units of proprietary interest in a cor
"Shares" means the units into which proprietary interests in a corporation
"State" means the District of Columbia or the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico o
"Tribal Council" means the Tribal Council of the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe.
"Tribal Court Clerk" means the clerk of the Tribal Court.
"Tribal Court" means the Tribal Courts of the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe.
"Tribal Member" means a person who is enrolled under the Tribe's Membership
"Tribal Secretary" means the Tribe's Office of General Counsel, or such oth
"Tribal Territory" or "Territory" means all lands within the 1796 Treaty wi
"Tribe" means the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe.
